definition: disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Can2 ji2 ren2 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: a child with a birth defect/a deformed child

sentences.english: Our factory has spared no cost to manufacture artificial limBs in order to serve disaBled people.
sentences.chinese: 本廠不惜工本製造假肢，爲殘疾人服務。

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天鄰基金會捐贈550張輪椅河南省沁陽市殘疾人士。

sentences.english: It is our bounden duty to help the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 幫助殘疾人是我們義不容辭的責任。

sentences.english: Candidates may be required to produce medical proof of their disability.
sentences.chinese: 申請人或須提交醫生證明書，以證明他爲殘疾人士。

sentences.english: I think in particular the two disabled athletes.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲尤其是那兩位殘疾運動員。

sentences.english: The crippled child tumbled down the stairs and was badly hurt .
sentences.chinese: 這個殘疾小孩從樓梯上摔了下來，傷的很重。

sentences.english: The illness disabled her and left her unable to study and work.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她殘疾，使她不能學習和工作。

sentences.english: This document embodies the concern of the government for the deformity.
sentences.chinese: 這個文件體現了政府對殘疾人的關懷。

sentences.english: This is an organization in charge of the affairs of the disabled ex-service men.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個負責退役殘疾軍人事務的組織。

sentences.english: The hotel has special facilities for welcoming disabled people.
sentences.chinese: 這家旅館有專供殘疾人使用的設施。

sentences.english: Building a business and a life in the face of a debilitating handicap.
sentences.chinese: 以虛弱的殘疾之身，建立一項事業或一種生活。

sentences.english: Some students in the system have multiple disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 這些視障學生當中的一些學生患多重殘疾。

sentences.english: The handicapped also include deaf - mutes and some brain paralysis amentia .
sentences.chinese: 殘疾人還包括聾啞人及部分腦癱智障患者。

sentences.english: The committee will work toward the establishment of a school for the handicapped.
sentences.chinese: 該委員會將爲建立一所殘疾學校而努力。

sentences.english: They cause death and disability. They cause suffering.
sentences.chinese: 它們造成死亡和殘疾，帶來痛苦。

sentences.english: And I will help invalids save their lives.
sentences.chinese: 我將幫忙殘疾人挽救他們的生命。

definition: disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
